title: Nasa Picture of the Day Application
desc: A React based Nasa POD App
about:
This project was created as a fun side project to experiment with various aspects of React development and design.

The project makes use of the NASI Open API that provides a picture of space for the current day.

The project was created to include a colour scheme toggle and makes use of Vite to improve performance on an already lightweight application.

 I plan to expand on this project with more features in the future.
